Package hr.java.production.main

Class Main

java.lang.Object
hr.java.production.main.Main
public class Main extends Object
Used for initialization of all variables and classes. Logs user input errors and successful initialization. Calculates requested values using Class defined methods.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • inputCategory

      public static Category inputCategory(Scanner input, Category[] categories)
      Used for creation of new categories using Scanner input, and it preforms input validation.
      Parameters:
      input - Takes Scanner object for the input of category name and description.
      categories - Category object array,which is used for input validation.
      Returns:
      New validated Category object.

    • printCategory

      public static void printCategory(Category cat)
      Prints data of passed Category object argument
      Parameters:
      cat - Category object.

    • inputItem

      public static Item inputItem(Scanner input, Category[] categories)
      Used for creation of new items using Scanner input, and it preforms input validation.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object for the input of required new data.
      categories - Category object Array, which contains all available categories for the items.
      Returns:
      New validated Item object.

    • printItems

      public static void printItems(Item[] items, History historyOfItems)
      Prints data of all Items.
      Parameters:
      items - Item object array, which contains all of previously inserted items.
      historyOfItems - History object, which tracks changes to the items.

    • inputFactory

      public static Factory inputFactory(Scanner input, Item[] itemList)
      Used for creation of new Factory object using Scanner input, and it preforms input validation.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object for the input of required new data.
      itemList - Item object array, which is used to assign items to factories.
      Returns:
      New validated Factory object.

    • inputStore

      public static Store inputStore(Scanner input, Item[] itemList)
      Used for creation of new Store object using Scanner input, and it preforms input validation.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object for the input of required new data.
      itemList - Item object array, which is used to assign items to stores.
      Returns:
      New validated Store object.

    • biggestVolume

      public static Factory biggestVolume(Factory[] factories)
      Calculates which factory has the biggest volume item.
      Parameters:
      factories - Factory object array, which contains all the factories and items inside factories.
      Returns:
      Factory object, which contains the item with biggest volume.

    • leastExpensive

      public static Store leastExpensive(Store[] stores)
      Calulates which store has the least expensive item.
      Parameters:
      stores - Factory object array, which contains all the stores and items inside stores.
      Returns:
      Store object, which contains the least expensive item.

    • ContainsItem

      public static boolean ContainsItem(Item[] factoryItems, Item item) throws InsertItemException
      Validates if passed Item object has already been inserted to factory or store.
      Parameters:
      factoryItems - Item object array, which contains all Items.
      item - Item object, which is being compared to all other items.
      Returns:
      If the Factory/Store does not contain the item it returns true, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      InsertItemException - Is thrown if the Factory/Store already contains inputed Item.

    • ContainsCategory

      public static boolean ContainsCategory(Category[] categories, String name) throws InsertCategoryException
      Validates if passed Category object name has already been inserted.
      Parameters:
      categories - Category object array, which is used for validation of newly inserted Category name.
      name - String name of the new Category.
      Returns:
      If the Category wasn't inserted before it return true.
      Throws:
      InsertCategoryException - Is thrown if the Category was previously inserted.
